/* PostpaidDtlMapper.getPostpaidDtlMemberList */
SELECT tmmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tmmp.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmmp.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, (SUBSTR(tmmp.SALE_DATE, 1,4) || '/' || SUBSTR(tmmp.SALE_DATE, 5,2) || '/' || SUBSTR(tmmp.SALE_DATE, 7)) AS SALE_DATE, tmmp.POSTPAID_FG, tmmp.POSTPAID_AMT, tmmp.DEPOSIT_AMT, tmmp.POSTPAID_PAY_FG, tcn.NMCODE_NM AS POSTPAID_PAY_FG_NM
FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_POSTPAID tmmp, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_CM_NMCODE tcn WHERE 1=1 AND tmmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}
AND tmmp.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND tmmp.SALE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmp.MEMBR_NO AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tmmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = tmmp.STORE_CD AND tcn.NMCODE_GRP_CD (+) = '074' AND tcn.NMCODE_CD (+) = tmmp.POSTPAID_PAY_FG
AND tmmp.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo} ||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY tmmp.SALE_DATE DESC, tms.STORE_CD, tmmp.MEMBR_NO ASC
